column4: come to think of it; i m thinking about switching back to 8.10... to many new issue with 9.04 :(
including: video now working inside firefox... bluetooth not working at all!
the same ones everyone else has: sound, flash, ext4, other odd things not working the same. For no other significant benefit....
I should probably do that too... I can't remember if the wpa-psk was working by default with 8.04
well it's decided then back to at 8.04 lts or 8.10

it's king of a shame; i decided to switch to 9.04 coz with 8.10 eveyrthing was fine until I install one of the recommanded upgrade and then... no more sound... or more precisely; it's was working on time to time and mostly not working at all
I've been seeing complaints about intermittent sound on this channel since 9.04 came out, with no consensus for a solution. Apparently the developers can't fix it either...
so they f.. it up and can't even roll back :( tsss
9.04 appears to have been rushed out the door without enough QA. Followed by a lot of denial...
no good ... you end up with a lot of bad publicity...
the sound issue i had it with 8.10... thinking of it; i ll definitively try 8.04 again hoping hte wireless will be working properly.. it's a pain to manually set it up
are you using a wifi connection? with 6.04?
I use wifi with 8.04, but that doesn't guarantee you can. It depends almost entirely on which wifi card you have, and if there are drivers available for it...
